long_description: The REI single-use CPR face shield offers protection to both the rescuer and victim when used properly by individuals trained in cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR). Plastic sheet and hydrophobic filter help to prevent possible contact with the victim's saliva or blood; helps prevent contact with the victim's mouth, nose and face. Sized to fit into wallets, pockets, small handbags and first-aid kits.
short_description: The REI single-use CPR face shield offers protection to both the rescuer and victim when used properly by individuals trained in cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR).
